scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.test: concurrently "cd server && npm run test" "cd client && npm run test"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd server && npm run lint" "cd client && npm run lint"
scripts.format: concurrently "cd server && npm run format" "cd client && npm run format"
